svg.text: Sorting Algorithms - Bubble, Selection, Insertion & Quick Sort

g.text: Compare adjacent elements and swap if they are in wrong order. Repeat until no swaps needed.
for j in range(0, n - i - 1):
Find minimum element and place it at beginning. Repeat for remaining unsorted portion.
Build sorted array one element at a time by inserting each element into its correct position.
Initial: First element is considered sorted
Choose a pivot, partition array so elements smaller than pivot are on left,
larger elements on right. Recursively sort both partitions.
After partitioning (elements ≤ pivot on left, > pivot on right):
Average: O(n log n), Worst: O(n²)
Algorithm | Best Case | Average | Worst | Space | Stable | Notes
